text:
② No great man was a great man until he was a great man.

③ The greatest men in a great nation are the greatest people in a great nation.

④ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a great nation.

⑤ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a small nation.

⑥ Sometimes in a small nation, the greatest people in a small nation are the greatest people in a great nation.

⑦ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a large nation.

⑧ Sometimes in a large nation, the greatest people in a large nation are the greatest people in a small nation.

⑨ Sometimes in a small nation, the greatest people in a small nation are the greatest people in a large nation.

⑩ Sometimes in a large nation, the greatest people in a large nation are the greatest people in a great nation.

⑪ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a medium nation.

⑫ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a very small nation.

⑬ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a tiny nation.

⑭ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a big nation.

⑮ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a middle-sized nation.

⑯ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a huge nation.

⑰ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a vast nation.

⑱ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a distant nation.

⑲ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a near nation.

⑳ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the greatest people in a nearby nation.

⑳ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the closest people to the greatest people in a great nation.

⑳ Sometimes in a great nation, the greatest people in a great nation are the nearest people to the greatest people in a great nation.

⑳ Sometimes in a great nation, the closest people to the greatest people in a great nation are the nearest people to the greatest people in a great nation.
